title: Global Voice Group Proud Sponsor of the Africa Telecom People 2015
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Global Voice Group Proud Sponsor of the Africa Telecom People 2015 Global Voice Group, in collaboration with Avatar Technologies and MedixWeb, has been proud to participate, as sponsor and exhibitor, in the 11th Africa Telecom People event. CAPE TOWN, SOUTH AFRICA, October 16,   Africa Telecom People 2015, 8-9 October 2015, Abidjan, Ivory Coast Global Voice Group (GVG), in collaboration with Avatar Technologies and MedixWeb, has been proud to participate, as sponsor and exhibitor, in the 11th Africa Telecom People (ATP) event that took place in Abidjan, Ivory Coast, last week. Every year, for more than a decade, the ATP has gathered the main actors of francophone Africa's telecommunications sector. This high-level rallying event purports to be an excellent opportunity for entrepreneurs, regulators and government stakeholders to meet and exchange views and information. Several thousands of visitors, 50 exhibition stands and hundreds of distinguished guests, including Dr. Abdoulkarim Soumaila, Secretary General of the African Telecommunications Union, and several African ministers, have participated in this major annual meeting of francophone Africa's telecoms, the main theme of which was "E-commerce in Africa". M. Francois Dugue, GVG's Senior Vice-President of Strategy, has addressed the audience on the use of technology, such as standardized electronic invoices, to optimize tax revenue and provide emerging and developing countries with innovative financing mechanisms for development. For more information on ATP 2015, please consult the event's official website: http://www.africatelecompeople.net/atp2015/index.php About Global Voice Group: Global Voice Group (GVG) stands out as one of the world's leading experts in ICT solutions for governments in emerging countries. Since 1998, the group pioneers innovative and proven ICT solutions to successfully assist governments in improving their governance and financial performance. GVG strongly commits to the technological and socio-economic empowerment of emerging countries, through technology transfer and innovative financing for development. The group has developed a unique approach to dramatically improve fiscal and regulatory compliance in key sectors of the economy, including but not limited to telecommunications and retail markets. Member of the International Telecommunication Union, GVG has been awarded the Frost & Sullivan Best Practice Award for its outstanding innovation in telecoms management technologies. CONTACT Global Voice Group: Michel Cauchy, Director of Corporate Communications, mcauchy@globalvoicegroup.com # # #
